markdown:
<title level="1" right="Skill " pfs="">[Agriculture](/Skills.aspx?ID=18)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 522</row>

Agriculture measures the kingdom's ability to cultivate the land, bringing forth crops, flocks, and livestock.

<title level="2">Agriculture Untrained General Actions</title>

- [Focused Attention](/Skills.aspx?ID=14&General=true) 

<title level="2">Related Feats</title>

To see a list of Feats related to Agriculture, [click here](/feats?include-traits=skill&exclude-traits=archetype&include-skills=agriculture&sort=level-asc%3Bname-asc).

<title level="2">Agriculture Untrained Actions</title>

<document level="3" id="action-1383" />
